episodes.title: Aum
episodes.description: Hello and thanks for joining me, Lori Kay, on the Crafty Narrative. Today I will be telling you about the cult that would go down in Japan's history book. Aum Shinrikyo Music thanks to Kevin Mac Leod for his song: Southern Gothic Sources: Aum Shinrikyo: The Japanese cult behind the Tokyo Sarin attack - BBC News III. Background of the Cult - A Case Study on the Aum Shinrikyo Deadly Doomsday Cult: How a False Messiah Changed Japan Forever | ENDEVR Documentary A Brief History of: The Tokyo subway Sarin attack (Short Documentary) Japan's Most Dangerous Cult, explained. Crazy Cult That Poisoned Tokyo
